fulltext:
Huỳ nh Hữ u Tí nh 
Bình Thạnh District, Hồ Chí Minh City, Việt Nam  
Objective 
To be a data science consultant and machine learning expert. 
Skills & Abilities 
BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE & DATA WAREHOUSING 
· Able to build a Business Intelligence, Data Warehouse and Data Lake system from the 
beginning of gathering business users’ requirement, designing the data models, going live with 
dashboards and leveraging it for predictive analytics. 
PREDICTIVE ANALYTICS & MACHINE LEARNING 
· Capable of developing predictive analytics and machine learning models from collecting the necessary 
data, making them ready for training and testing, evaluating and deploying the models to daily use 
applications and systems. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
· Programming and scripts: SQL, Python, R, C#, Java, Scala, Bash, PowerShell, MDX, DAX, SPSS, Go. 
· Databases: Redshift, BigQuery, Snowflake, SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Cassandra. 
· Cloud platforms and services: Azure (Machine Learning, SQL Data Warehouse, SQL Database, Data 
Factory, Function, VM), AWS (Redshift, S3, RDS, EC2), GCP (BigQuery, Datalab, ML Engine), Snowflake. 
· IDE, tools and frameworks: Visual Studio, RStudio, Jupyter, Power BI, Tableau, Qlik Sense, DOMO, 
BusinessObjects, Looker, Cognos BI, SPSS, Anaconda, Docker, Git, Pentaho, Talend Studio, Airflow, Kafka, 
Nifi, Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Presto, Zeppelin. 
· Algorithms and libraries: Regressions, Support Vector Machines, KNN, Bayesian, Time Series, 
Recommendation Systems, K-Means, Ensembles (XGBoost, LightGBM), Spark ML, Deep Learning 
(TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, CNTK, Theano). 
SOFT SKILLS 
· Team Leading & Training, Presentation, Communication, Search, Self-Study and Research. 
· Strong ability in foreign languages: English, French, and Chinese. 
Education 
MASTER OF SCIENCE | 2013 | VIETNAM – GERMAN UNIVERSITY (NOT COMPLETED) 
· Major: Business Information System 
BACHELOR OF ENGINEERING | 2003 | HCMC UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY (POLYTECHNIC) 
· Major: Telecommunication and Electronics 
HIGHER DIPLOMA | 2005 | LT APTECH 
· Major: Software Engineering 
MICROSOFT PROFESSIONAL PROGRAM DATA SCIENCE CERTIFICATE | 2017 | EDX 
· Major: Data Science 
Page 2 
Experience 
DATA CONSULTANT | SCC | IT SOLUTIONS & SERVICES | 2019 – NOW 
· Work: Consult, architect and implement a new Data & Analytics platform on Azure, Snowflake and Power BI with 
migration of legacy one from on-premise and SAP BusinessObjects. 
MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER | JIO HEALTH | HEALTHCARE | 2018 - 2019 
· Work: Design, implement and deploy advanced analytics and machine learning models. 
· Achievement and Delivery: Business Analytics system go live, Customer Life-Time Value model, Home Visit 
service prediction model. 
DATA ARCHITECT | ADURO LABS | HEALTHCARE & WELLNESS | 2017 - 2018 
· Work: Design the data models and platform for data analytics and machine learning, document the data layer 
specifications, database schemas, data flows, integration interfaces, and API. 
· Achievement and Delivery: ADURO Data Warehouse & Data Lake, Recommendation system. 
BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE MANAGER | OMG ASIA – K2 INSIGHT | RETAIL | 2016 - 2017 
· Work: Control and monitor development process of the BI product to be consistent with business requirements 
and current system design efficiently, complete projects within timeline. 
· Achievement and Delivery: Sales forecasting model, Promotion effect prediction system. 
BI ANALYST – DATA ARCHITECT – TECHNICAL LEAD | ECOM TRADING | COMMODITY TRADING | 2012 - 2016 
· Work: Gather and analyze user requirements, design the data models of Enterprise Data Warehouse and Local 
Data Marts and lead the implementation of ETL, OLAP Cubes, Reports and SharePoint Dashboards. 
· Achievement and Delivery: Asia Coffee BI-DW system go-live for Vietnam, India and Indonesia; Coffee price and 
trading volume prediction model. 
DATABASE ARCHITECT | HARVEY NASH | SOFTWARE OUTSOURCING | 2012 – 2012 
SENIOR BI DEVELOPER | EPINION | MARKET RESEARCH | 2010 – 2012 
BI SYSTEM ANALYST | UNITED PHARMA | PHARMACEUTICAL | 2010 – 2010 
SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER | IBM | GLOBAL BUSINESS SERVICES | 2007 – 2009 
COBOL DEVELOPER | IACP ASIA | INSURANCE | 2005 – 2007 
FIELD QUALITY SPECIALIST – DATA ANALYST | SAMSUNG VINA | ELECTRONICS MANUFACTURING | 2003 – 2005. 
Onsite & Training 
· March 2004 – Malaysia: Global Samsung SAP R/3, Business Warehouse & Business Explorer for 
Data Analysis 
· March 2005 – Korea: Samsung Hi-Tech Product Technology and Specification 
· April 2005 – Singapore: Black Belt Six Sigma 
· October 2008 – France: IBM Project meeting and training 
· May 2013 – USA: Global MIS meeting to finalize ECOM Data Warehouse & Local Data Mart Model and ETL 
Architecture 
· April 2015 – USA: Kimball Group – Dimensional Modeling in Depth.
